p5 div shortcodes embed p5.js code within a div element. There are two p5 div shortcodes: p5-div and p5-instance-div. p5-div # {{< p5-div ver="1.4.1" sketch="/path/to/sketch.js" lib1="https://cdntolib1/lib1.js" >}} All parameters are optional but sketch. Default values are shown in the above snippet but for libs*. Up to lib5 libs may be specified.
